citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 to 1:30 pm
on 23-AUG-17.
Blow horn, call phone numbers, leave business card.
